column1: @entity0 likes to play sports. He spends his time after school playing basketball and baseball. Sometimes @entity0 pretends he is a famous baseball pitcher for his favorite team with his friends. He plays with his friends @entity1 and @entity2. @entity0 also plays pretend when he is alone. He has an imaginary friend named @entity3. @entity3 is an elephant who watches television with @entity0. @entity1 likes playing baseball but she also likes to paint. @entity1's favorite class at school is art. She likes making pictures of flowers. Her teacher says she is a good artist. She painted a picture of a tree for her teacher. There were red and yellow leaves on it. It had apples on it. When @entity2 goes home after baseball, he likes to eat a snack. He eats carrots and bananas. If he is a good boy his mom, Mrs. Smith, sometimes gives him milk and cookies. Afterwards, @entity2 finishes his homework.
